columns.name: CustomerId
columns.title: Unique Identifier for Customer

columns.name: CustomerTypeId
columns.title: Type of Customer Account

columns.name: CustomerRelationshipTypeId
columns.title: Type of Relationship with Customer

columns.name: DateOfBirth
columns.title: Customer's Date of Birth

columns.name: CustomerEstablishedDate
columns.title: Date Customer Account Established

columns.name: IsActive
columns.title: Active Status of Customer

columns.name: FirstName
columns.title: Customer's First Name

columns.name: LastName
columns.title: Customer's Last Name

columns.name: Gender
columns.title: Customer's Gender

columns.name: PrimaryPhone
columns.title: Primary Contact Phone Number

columns.name: SecondaryPhone
columns.title: Secondary Contact Phone Number

columns.name: PrimaryEmail
columns.title: Primary Email Address

columns.name: SecondaryEmail
columns.title: Secondary Email Address

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.title: User Who Created Record

columns.name: GoldLoadTimestamp
columns.title: Timestamp for Gold Load Event

columns.name: PolicyId
columns.title: Unique identifier for the insurance policy.

columns.name: CustomerId
columns.title: Identifier for the customer associated with policy.

columns.name: PolicyType
columns.title: Type of insurance coverage provided by policy.

columns.name: Premium
columns.title: Total cost of the insurance policy.

columns.name: PaymentType
columns.title: Frequency of payments for the policy (e.g., monthly, quarterly).

columns.name: StartDate
columns.title: Length of time the policy is valid (in months).

columns.name: Duration
columns.title: Amount due for each payment period.

columns.name: PaymentAmount
columns.title: Amount due for each payment period.

columns.name: AdditionalNotes
columns.title: Notes regarding payment history or issues.

columns.name: ClaimId
columns.title: Unique identifier for each insurance claim.

columns.name: CustomerId
columns.title: IIdentifier for the customer making the claim.

columns.name: PolicyId
columns.title: Identifier for the policy associated with the claim.

columns.name: ClaimType
columns.title: Type of claim being filed (e.g., Home, Auto).

columns.name: ClaimDate
columns.title: Date when the claim was submitted.

columns.name: Details
columns.title: Description of the incident or damage leading to the claim.

columns.name: CommunicationId
columns.title: Unique identifier for each communication record

columns.name: CustomerId
columns.title: Identifier for the customer involved in communication

columns.name: PolicyId
columns.title: Identifier for the policy related to communication

columns.name: CommunicationType
columns.title: Type of communication (e.g., SMS, Email)

columns.name: CommunicationDate
columns.title: Date when the communication took place

columns.name: Summary
columns.title: Concise description of the communication's purpose
